DOCNAME: CASE OF FILIMONOV AND FAZLUTDINOV v. RUSSIA
CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 13 - Right to an effective remedy (Article 13 - Effective remedy)
TEXT: CARDINAL . NORP The list of applicants and the relevant details of the applications are set out in the appended table .

CARDINAL . The applicants complained of the inadequate conditions of their detention . They also argued that they did not have an effective domestic remedy to complain about the poor detention conditions .
